name: Fabled Sun
description:
Humanity has hidden underground for generations.  Its few scattered communities are losing their connections to each other, losing their ability to cooperate.  Fortunately, you haven't given up hope.  You've heard stories of a better world above, and you mean to find it.

The Fabled Sun is a small metroidvania drawing inspiration from classic NES titles like Metroid, Legacy of the Wizard, and Blaster Master.  Explore the sprawling caverns of this underground world and discover strange flora and fauna.  Visit towns and hear what people have to say.  Find helpful items and the keys that will open the path to the surface.

Controls include Gamepad support and keyboard.  Controls can be changed in the game menu.

Default keybindings are:

movement: WASD for movement

Jump: spacebar

Talk/Attack: J (attack requires a weapon)

Alternate attack: K (requires a different weapon)

Menu/Pause: P
